node.title: How to Watch the 2021 Latin Grammy Awards Tonight
node.alt: Gloria Estefan will open the Latin Grammys tonight.
node.description: The 22nd annual Latin Grammys will be shown live on Thursday at 8 p.m. Eastern on Univision. Gloria Estefan, Rub√©n Blades, Camilo and more are scheduled to perform.
node.content: ["The Latin Grammys exult in spectacle. Last year, Karol G danced on a pink platform between two unicorns, J Balvin sang under a giant pair of praying hands and Bad Bunny belted \u201cBichiyal\u201d from a moving car.", "This year, Bad Bunny will return as part of a lineup stocked with big names, including Myke Towers and Christina Aguilera. In-person acceptance speeches and performances will take place in Las Vegas at the MGM Grand Garden Arena, at a ceremony hosted by the actresses Ana Brenda Contreras and Roselyn S\u00e1nchez and the singer Carlos Rivera.", "The 22nd annual Latin Grammys will be shown live on Thursday at 8 p.m. Eastern on Univision and available on the Univision app, although subscription fees may apply. The event will also air on TNT at 7 p.m. in Mexico, 8 p.m. in Panama and Colombia, 9 p.m. in Venezuela and 10 p.m. in Argentina and Chile.", "Gloria Estefan will kick off the show with a three-song medley and guests including Anitta, Carlinhos Brown, La\u00e9rcio da Costa, Pedro Cap\u00f3, Farina, Giulia Be and Diego Torres.", "Other performers include Rub\u00e9n Blades (who will be honored as the person of the year) with Roberto Delgado & Orquesta, as well as Man\u00e1, Pablo Albor\u00e1n, Alejandro Fern\u00e1ndez, Nella, Ozuna, Paula Arenas, Danna Paola, Banda El Recodo de Cruz Liz\u00e1rraga, Calibre 50, Los Dos Carnales, Camilo, Julio Reyes Copello, DJ Nelson, Sergio George, Grupo Firme and Jay Wheeler.", "Juanes will be joined by Rub\u00e9n Albarr\u00e1n and Meme del Real of Caf\u00e9 Tacvba for Juan Gabriel\u2019s \u201cNo Tengo Dinero,\u201d and C. Tangana will take the stage with Antonio Carmona, Diego del Morao, Jorge Drexler, Israel Fern\u00e1ndez, La H\u00fangara, Natalia Lafourcade and Omar Apollo. Descemer Bueno, Gente de Zona and Yotuel will debut an acoustic performance of \u201cPatria y Vida,\u201d nominated for song of the year. Mon Laferte and Gloria Trevi will team with La Arrolladora Banda El Lim\u00f3n de Ren\u00e9 Camacho for \u201cLa Mujer,\u201d nominated for best pop song.", "And Christina Aguilera, who last took the Latin Grammys stage in 2000, has announced an extended performance that includes her latest single, \u201cPa Mis Muchachas,\u201d with Nicki Nicole, Nathy Peluso and Becky G.", "Keep an eye out for the ever-contested record of the year category, this year an 11-track race among \u201cSi Hubieras Querido\u201d by Pablo Albor\u00e1n, \u201cTodo De Ti\u201d by Rauw Alejandro, \u201cUn Amor Eterno (Versi\u00f3n Balada)\u201d by Marc Anthony, \u201cA Tu Lado\u201d by Paula Arenas, \u201cBohemio\u201d by Andr\u00e9s Calamaro and Julio Iglesias, \u201cVida De Rico\u201d by Camilo, \u201cSu\u00e9ltame, Bogot\u00e1\u201d by Diamante El\u00e9ctrico, \u201cAm\u00e9n\u201d by Ricardo Montaner, Mau y Ricky, Camilo and Evaluna Montaner, \u201cDios As\u00ed Lo Quiso\u201d by Ricardo Montaner and Juan Luis Guerra, \u201cTe Olvidaste\u201d by C. Tangana and Omar Apollo and \u201cTalvez\u201d by Caetano Veloso and Tom Veloso.", "The official premiere ceremony \u2014 the show before the main event where 45 of the 53 categories will be awarded \u2014 begins at 4 p.m., hosted by the singer-songwriter Kany Garc\u00eda and the actress Carolina Dieckmann. It will be held at the Michelob Ultra Arena at Mandalay Bay, and webcast globally via the Latin Grammys\u2019 Facebook Live and YouTube channel.", "The premiere ceremony will also feature performances by a host of nominees, including Gera Demara, Nora Gonz\u00e1lez, Zoe Gotusso, Love of Lesbian, Luedji Luna, Os Bar\u00f5es da Pisadinha, Nando Reis, Gonzalo Rubalcaba and Jon Secada. Lupita Infante, who was previously nominated, will appear as a special guest.", "For the second time, all Portuguese language categories will be awarded separately in a premiere ceremony for Brazilian audiences that follows the 4 p.m. event."]
